channel.title: Error please help
channel.description:
Hi, whenever I try a runningclient, I get up to typing in my username and password and i get this error:
# # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK (0xc0000092) at pc=0x0093cea9, pid=2520, tid=1312 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (1.6.0_02-b06 mixed mode, sharing) # Problematic frame: # v ~RuntimeStub::resolve_opt_virtual_call # # An error report file with more information is saved as hs_err_pid2520.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
I have tried most things including downloading the latest java releases but nothing will work, it happens with everyclient I try to load...
If anyone could help plese reply ASAP. Thank you very much :)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 03:22:04 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Error please help
item.dc:creator: @PeteZ PeteZ
item.description:
@PeteZ wrote:

ya i have jdk, and sorry about the bump i need to know the answer pretty fast ya know.=]

item.title: Error please help
item.dc:creator: @PeteZ PeteZ
item.description:
@PeteZ wrote:

Hi, whenever I try a runningclient, I get up to typing in my username and password and i get this error:

An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment:

EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK (0xc0000092) at pc=0x0093cea9, pid=2520, tid=1312

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ Client VM (1.6.0_02-b06 mixed mode, sharing)

v ~RuntimeStub::resolve_opt_virtual_call

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp
